name: PMC Biogenix - Hystrene® Fatty Acids
description: PMC Biogenix offers a comprehensive range of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids under the Hystrene brand. These fatty acids with carbon chain lengths from C16 to C22 are essential components for skin barrier repair formulations. Fatty acids constitute approximately 15-25% of the skin's stratum corneum lipids and work synergistically with ceramides and cholesterol to maintain barrier integrity.
notes: Established oleochemical manufacturer with extensive fatty acid portfolio. Products suitable for barrier repair formulations requiring the optimal 3:1:1 ceramide:cholesterol:fatty acid ratio. Technical support available for formulation guidance.
